short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover all pincode details with Pincode Explorer. Get all geographical insights in a user-friendly interface!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover comprehensive details about any Pincode with just a few clicks! Pincode Explorer is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to provide you with all the information you need about postal codes across India.

Key Features:

Name & Description: Quickly access the official name and a brief description of the area associated with the pincode.

Branch Type: Learn about the type of postal branch (e.g., Head Office, Sub Office, Branch Office).

Geographical Insights: Get detailed information on the Circle, District, Division, Region, and State.
Country Info: Verify the country for international users or cross-referencing.

User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a seamless experience with our intuitive design and quick lookup functionality.
